promoCards.title: Ninetails
powers: You may discard a card. If you do, {Ninetails} deals up to 9 targets 1 fire damage each. Otherwise, {Ninetails} deals up to 3 targets 1 fire damage each.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player may play a card.
Select a target. Damage dealt to that target is irreducible until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: I've learned, I'm ready to be a hero this time!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.KumihoCharacter: I am not like you. I will [b]never[/b] be like you.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This is one fox who won't let your hounds get her!

promoCards.title: Ninetails
powers: Discard up to 3 cards. One other player may draw up to as many cards as you discard this way.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One hero may use a power.
Put an ongoing card from a hero trash into play.

openingLines.default: Keep the flashy power to a minimum, we want to keep this secret.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.KumihoCharacter: This is [i]your[/i] last chance. Today, you die!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I need to study this threat to defeat it.

promoCards.title: Ninetails
powers: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage. If a Ghost is dealt damage this way, {Ninetails} deals 1 non-hero target 3 fire damage, then draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
Select a hero. Convert the next damage dealt by that hero to fire damage and increase it by 2.

openingLines.default: Let me see... Oh yeah, I cast Fireball!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.KumihoCharacter: I'm not out of spells yet!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I know how to deal with you... More fireballs!

cards.title: Ninetails
powers: The next time {Ninetails} would be dealt 2 or less damage, redirect it to another target.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Redirect the next damage dealt to a hero target to another target.

openingLines.default: Just because I'm new to this doesn't mean I can't outfox you.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.KumihoCharacter: What did you do to me? What am I?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This is bad this is bad this is bad!

cards.title: Assert Humanity
body: You may destroy one of your ongoing cards. If you do, {Ninetails} deals up to 2 targets 3 melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: I am [b]NOT[/b] a [b]MONSTER![/b] I am a [b]PERSON![/b]

cards.title: Book Smarts, Street Smarts
body: Either draw 3 cards or redirect the next damage dealt to {Ninetails} to another target.

flavorQuotes.text: Despite my magic power, I'm a scientist at heart.
That, Miss Fisher, is precisely why the Bureau Arcanum needs you.

cards.title: Burning Whisper
body: Increase all fire damage by 1. When this card enters play, {Ninetails} deals up to 2 targets 1 fire damage each.
powers: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 4 fire damage. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: This spell lets me light all the torches, right?
Yes, but that's not really the intent�
I do it.

cards.title: Dancing Flame
body: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 1 fire damage and 1 melee damage. You may discard a card. If you do, redirect the next damage dealt to {Ninetails} to that target.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm glad to see you're putting those{BR}dance lessons to good use.

cards.title: Fox Echo
body: At the end of your turn, each player may draw a card. If at least {H - 1} cards are drawn this way, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, you may play an ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: They're the remnants of those who tried{BR}this quest before... and failed.

cards.title: Fox Marble
powers: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 1 fire damage. You may draw 1 card or play 1 Ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: Jade, what do you{BR}have there?
I think it's part of my soul.

cards.title: Fox Shape
body: Whenever damage is redirected away from {Ninetails}, increase or reduce it by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: It's weird how natural being a quadruped{BR}feels. I haven't tripped once!{BR}And how am I talking with this mouth?

cards.title: Foxfire Burst
body: {Ninetails} deals each non-hero target 2 fire damage. You may discard a card. If you do, you may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Back, foul spirits! Did I do that right?

cards.title: Jade's Collar
body: When {Ninetails} would be dealt damage by an environment card, you may discard a card to redirect that damage to a villain target.

flavorQuotes.text: I hate pretending to be someone's pet,{BR}but it has saved my life several times.

cards.title: Predatory Nature
body: When this card enters your hand, put it into play. Damage dealt by {Ninetails} cannot be redirected. At the end of your turn, {Ninetails} deals 1 other hero target 2 melee damage. If no damage is dealt this way, she deals herself 4 irreducible toxic damage.
powers: Destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP. If a target is destroyed this way, {Ninetails} gains 3 HP, then shuffle this card into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: What have I done? [b]What have I done!?[/b]

cards.flavorReference: Jade Fisher, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #5

cards.title: Scientific Approach to Magic
body: Whenever you discard a card, {Ninetails} gains 1 HP. At the end of your turn, you may discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything is explicable. Even� This.

cards.flavorReference: Jade Fisher, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #5

cards.title: Spirit of Deception
body: At the end of your turn, you may destroy an ongoing card. If you do, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, {Ninetails} deals each non-hero target 1 irreducible psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: What are lies? � What is truth?

cards.flavorReference: Spirit of Deception, Guardians of Tomorrow #82

cards.title: Spirit Visions
body: The first time each turn {Ninetails} would be dealt damage, redirect it to a Ghost in her play area.
powers: You may discard a card. If you do, put a ghost from your trash into play or your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you see that?
There? It's just a shadow.

cards.title: Stalked By Ghosts
body: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 3 infernal damage. Reveal cards from your deck until a ghost is revealed. Put it into play. Discard the other revealed cards and shuffle your trash into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Once ghosts realize you can see them,{BR}they will never leave you alone.

cards.title: Twisting Cinder
body: At the end of your turn, this card may deal 1 target up to 3 fire damage. If 3 or more damage is dealt this way, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't know what they are, they just{br}keep following me around.
